1.png.description: The green pot plant is visible and centered in the frame, but it is still some distance away. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

2.png.description: The green pot plant is visible and centered in the frame. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

3.png.description: The green pot plant is visible and centered on the table. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

4.png.description: The green pot plant is visible and centered on the table. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it in view.

5.png.description: The green pot plant is clearly visible, takes up a significant portion of the image, and appears extremely close with clear texture and depth details. No further movement is necessary.
